about:
Hi, I am Brady Dorsey. I am a Developer from Houston, TX, with a background in logistics and data technology. My hobbies are making video games and videography.


Graduated from Flatiron School with a certificate in Software Engineering, I have a passion for learning new technologies, creating full stack web applications. My transition into programming has been driven by my motivation to innovate and make an impact on future generation technology. I hope to use my skills in order to create innovative solutions and empower businsses to thrive.
